review: During the surgery, Dr. Adil demonstrated remarkable support and provided clear explanations every step of the way. His reassuring demeanor and thorough communication helped alleviate any apprehension I had about the procedure. He took the time to answer all my questions and ensured I felt informed and comfortable throughout the surgery. Dr. Adil's kindness and attentiveness made a significant difference in my overall experience, and I am grateful for their compassionate care. Thank you once again.

review: Dr Adil was really kind and made me feel comfortable. He was congnisant of my anxiety and was extremely sensitive towards it. Made sure the procedure was as painfree as it could get for me. He walked me through the procedure step by step as we went through it. The post surgery care was also explained really well. If only I had a dentist like him in my childhood, I wouldn't have been terrified of dental procedures today!
reply_text:

You were wonder patient.
